name: Coastal Shipbuilding Holdings, Inc.
description: Coastal Shipbuilding Holdings, Inc. is an innovative leader in the maritime industry, specializing in the design, construction, and repair of advanced vessels for commercial and government clients. Founded in 2010, Coastal Shipbuilding has established itself as a reliable partner for a variety of maritime projects, including offshore support vessels, fishing boats, and research vessels. The company prides itself on its commitment to sustainability, utilizing cutting-edge technologies and eco-friendly materials in its shipbuilding processes to minimize environmental impact. Coastal Shipbuilding's state-of-the-art facilities are equipped with modern manufacturing techniques and a skilled workforce dedicated to quality and safety. The company also offers comprehensive repair and maintenance services, ensuring that vessels remain operational and up to regulatory standards throughout their lifespan. With a strong focus on innovation, Coastal Shipbuilding is continuously exploring new designs and technologies to meet the evolving needs of the maritime sector. The company aims to enhance maritime safety and efficiency through its products and services, contributing to the growth of the blue economy.

seo.meta_title: Coastal Shipbuilding Holdings, Inc. | Maritime Innovation and Vessel Construction
seo.meta_description: Explore Coastal Shipbuilding Holdings, Inc., a leader in maritime innovation specializing in vessel construction and repair services. Discover our commitment to sustainability and safety in the maritime industry.

faq.question: What does Coastal Shipbuilding do?
faq.answer: Coastal Shipbuilding specializes in the design, construction, and repair of various types of vessels for commercial and government clients.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Coastal Shipbuilding?
faq.answer: Sarah Thompson is the CEO of Coastal Shipbuilding Holdings, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Coastal Shipbuilding headquartered?
faq.answer: Coastal Shipbuilding is headquartered in Newport News, Virginia, USA.

faq.question: What types of vessels does Coastal Shipbuilding construct?
faq.answer: Coastal Shipbuilding constructs offshore support vessels, fishing boats, and research vessels.
